text: The SPAS-12 (Special Purpose Automatic Shotgun) is an Italian combat shotgun that was produced from 1979 until 2000. It is used by police and military forces in many countries around the world. The SPAS-12 is a dual-mode shotgun, adjustable for semi-automatic or pump-action operation. It is a 12 gauge shotgun and has an internal tubular magazine of 5 to 8 rounds. The SPAS-12 has been popular in many movies, TV shows, and video games including Call of Duty, Battlefield, Grand Theft Auto, Left 4 Dead and more. Category:Shotguns
